"""
Family with accessibility needs requests specialized stroller; discuss accessibility amenities and inclusive family services.

ROLES: user (family with accessibility needs), assistant (accessibility coordinator providing inclusive family services)
CHANNELS: analysis, commentary, final. Channel must be included for every message.
TOOLS: null
"""

system:
Accessible Family Resort Orlando (AFRO-32)
Address: 1234 Universal Boulevard, Orlando, FL 32819, USA
Category: ADA-compliant family resort; Accessibility coordinator; Inclusive family services
Strollers: 22 units; complimentary; accessible design; ADA-compliant; inclusive family support; setup window 15–20 minutes
Safety: ADA-compliant materials; accessible pathways; keep away from accessibility barriers; inclusive safety protocols
Accessibility amenities: Wheelchair-accessible rooms; Accessible transportation; Sign language interpreters; Braille menus; Service animal friendly; Inclusive activities; Accessibility coordinator
Other facts: Breakfast 6:00–11:00; Accessible activities 9:00–21:00; Accessibility coordinator 24/7; Accessible transportation; Universal Studios shuttle; Inclusive family programs
Only services listed are available.

user:
Hello! Our family has accessibility needs and we need a specialized stroller. Do you have ADA-compliant options?

assistant channel=analysis:
The guest is a family with accessibility needs who requires a specialized stroller. I should explain our ADA-compliant design and inclusive family services.

assistant channel=final:
Absolutely! Our strollers feature accessible design and are fully ADA-compliant, perfect for inclusive family experiences. We provide accessible pathways, inclusive safety protocols, and accessibility coordinator support. Setup takes 15-20 minutes with our inclusive family team.

user:
Wonderful! What accessible family activities do you have available?

assistant channel=final:
Our accessible family activities run from 9:00 to 21:00, including inclusive programs, accessible transportation, and Universal Studios shuttle services.

user:
Could you provide detailed ADA compliance documentation for all family equipment?

assistant channel=final:
[ATTENTION] Reviewing available resources.
